projects.name: Coca-Cola Happy Shopmate
projects.description: The Happy Shompate App has the most exciting deals, perks and freebies online.This application has bunch of features which includes Coupons, NFC, Qrcode and Beacon detection which allow users to redeem and win instant prizes.

work.summary: Support various projects that focuses on data collection of different racing data from different countries that will be used on betting

projects.name: Australia Data Collection
projects.description: This project focuses on collecting racing data from different data sources in Australia that will be used in betting.
